CI = 0.18 x CD ($810k); includes site supervision; temporary facilities; HSE; QA/QC field inspection; per fallback typical model
P = 0.02 x MAT ($143k); includes test equipment sourcing; vendor coordination; expediting; per fallback typical model
PM = 0.06 x (CD + CI + MAT) ($1099k); includes testing coordination; schedule management; per fallback typical model
COM = 0.03 x (CD + CI + MAT) ($1099k); pre-commissioning support; handover to PKG-30 Commissioning
